title: Population Growth Forecast
results: Linear model: prediction of 8.53 billion, absolute error of 0.40 billion
Quadratic model: prediction of 8.69 billion, absolute error of 0.22 billion
Exponential model: prediction of 9.55 billion, absolute error of 1.30 billion
summary: A data science project that explores population forecasting using regression models (linear, quadratic, and exponential) based on real data from the UN Data Portal.
